changes: Complete visual overhaul with a new modern dark theme.
Removed status indicators from service cards.
Added search bar to filter services.
Added available and unavailable status to services.
Added new services: SearXNG, Hastebin, Kiwix, Immich, Bookstack, Navidrome.
Simplified interface by removing external and local options
Added status icons so you can see when I break my server again
Created a changelog to view updates
Updated content and appearance of the help page
